title: Gorgeous: Book Two
description: (Gorgeous: Book Two is the conclusion to the steamy, adult contemporary romance novel that made you blush and swoon.)Ronan was the knight in shining armor she had never dreamed of or needed, and Olivia was the color in his cold gray life.He loved her sass, and much to her surprise, she didn't mind when he took control.They shared a moon.They were meant to be.Until the nightmares of their pasts rock their newfound happiness putting the magic they share to the test.Theyâ€™ll soon discover if they have what it takes to fight their way back to each other. To share their moon, once again.(18+ for adult themes.)
author: Lisa Shelby
